name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mickey Mouse: Fun and Magic in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Mickey Mouse in a cheerful live theme featuring delightful animations and easy shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the magic of Mickey Mouse to your browser with this delightful theme featuring charming design and quick shortcuts.
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Celebrate the timeless charm of Mickey Mouse with vibrant visuals and dynamic aesthetics.
Minimalist Design: A clean and cheerful interface inspired by Mickey’s iconic and playful style.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance while enjoying Mickey’s magic.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly navigate to your favorite websites with ease.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
Play Games: Access entertaining games directly from your shortcuts for a fun and engaging experience.
